posts.title: 安装教程
posts.excerpt: 网易云音乐修复1sudo gedit /etc/sudoers 修改/etc/sudoers文件，加一行：1YOURNAME ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/netease-cloud-music YOURNAME为你登录的用户名1sudo gedit /usr/share/applications/netease-cloud-music.desktop 修改Exec=netease-cloud-music %U 为 Exec=sudo netease-cloud-music %U, 这样点击网易云音乐图标就是以管理员权限启动的了，且不用输入密码了。于此同时设置root/admin等没有密码登录
posts.text: 网易云音乐修复1sudo gedit /etc/sudoers 修改/etc/sudoers文件，加一行：1YOURNAME ALL = NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/netease-cloud-music YOURNAME为你登录的用户名1sudo gedit /usr/share/applications/netease-cloud-music.desktop 修改Exec=netease-cloud-music %U 为 Exec=sudo netease-cloud-music %U, 这样点击网易云音乐图标就是以管理员权限启动的了，且不用输入密码了。于此同时设置root/admin等没有密码登录 终端美化1234567891011121314151617sudo apt install zshsudo apt install git sh -c "$(wget https://raw.github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh -O -)"chsh -s /bin/zsh echo $SHELL #查看当前shell cat /etc/shells #查看系统已安装的shellgit clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions /home/.oh-my-zsh/plugins/zsh-autosuggestionsgit clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git /home/.oh-my-zsh/plugins/home/.oh-my-zsh/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlightingsudo -icd /home/.oh-my-zsh/pluginsmkdir incrgit clone http://mimosa-pudica.net/src/incr-0.2.zsh /home/.oh-my-zsh/plugins/incrcat /home/.zshrcZSH_THEME="ys"ENABLE_CORRECTION="true"COMPLETION_WAITING_DOTS="true"plugins=( git autojump incr zsh-autosuggestions zsh-syntax-highlighting ) 微信、QQ、百度云盘等的安装123456sudo dpkg --add-architecture i386 wget -nc https://dl.winehq.org/wine-builds/Release.key sudo apt-key add Release.key sudo apt-add-repository https://dl.winehq.org/wine-builds/ubuntu/ sudo apt-get updategit clone https://github.com/wszqkzqk/deepin-wine-ubuntu.git /home 然后下载相应的.deb包即可安装托盘：安装ToplconPlus的gnome-shell扩展 桌面美化12345678sudo apt install gnome-tweak-toolsudo apt install dockysudo apt install gnome-shell-extensionssudo apt install chrome-gnome-shell#下载相应的主题、图标、字体放入对应的文件即可（例如下载到/home/file/内）————Gnome-lookcp -r /home/file/themes/ /usr/share/themescp -r /home/file/icons/ /usr/share/iconscp -r /home/file/fonts/ /usr/share/fonts Grub2美化1234567下载主题包，Gnome Look - GRUB themescd /boot/grub mkdir themescp -r /home/file/grub/themes/ /boot/grub/themes/sudo gedit /etc/default/grub#修改GRUB_THEME="/boot/grub/themes/主题包文件夹名称/theme.txt"sudo update-grub 字体修复1234下载缺失文字复制到/usr/share/fonts中sudo mkfontscalesudo mkfontdirsudo fc-cache python 修复1234567sudo apt install python3sudo update-alternatives --list pythonls /usr/bin/sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/python python /usr/bin/python2.7 1sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/python python /usr/bin/python3.5 2sudo update-alternatives --config python#或者sudo apt-get remove python(不建议使用) 部分软件安装WPS、Chrome、网易云音乐、Rstudio官网下载即可。 #spyder安装1sudo apt install spyder #GIMP安装123sudo add-apt-repository ppa:otto-kesselgulasch/gimpsudo apt-get updatesudo apt-get install gimp #其他安装1234sudo apt-get install shuttersudo apt-get install gnome-mpvsuso apt-get install axelsudo apt-get install apt-fast #sublime-text安装123sudo add-apt-repository ppa:webupd8team/sublime-text-3 sudo apt-get updatesudo apt-get install sublime-text #typora的安装1234sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys BA300B7755AFCFAEsudo add-apt-repository 'deb https://typora.io/linux ./' sudo apt updatesudo apt install typora ubuntu 18.04 命令行与图形界面的切换1sudo gedit /etc/default/grub 找到 GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX_DEFAULT,在此行末尾输入 nomodeset1sudo update-grub 18.04 键盘背光打开建立led.sh文件，代码如下：12345678910111213141516171819202122232425#!/bin/bash - #===============================================================================## FILE: ledctrl# # USAGE: ./ledctrl # # DESCRIPTION: # # OPTIONS: ---# REQUIREMENTS: ---# BUGS: ---# NOTES: ---# AUTHOR: linkscue (scue), linkscue@gmail.com# ORGANIZATION: # CREATED: 2014年02月13日 13时16分55秒 CST# REVISION: ---#===============================================================================​status=/tmp/keyboard_led_statusif [[ ${1} == "on" ]] || [[ ! -e ${status} ]]; then xset led named 'Scroll Lock' && echo "on" > ${status}else xset -led named 'Scroll Lock' && rm -f ${status}fi 于 /bin中新建一个led文件，将led.sh放入文件中，于键盘中添加快捷键，命令为 bash /bin/led/led.sh,设置快捷键即可。 caj文件阅读器的安装12345678sudo dpkg --add-architecture i386wget -nc https://dl.winehq.org/wine-builds/Release.keysudo apt-key add Release.keysudo apt-add-repository https://dl.winehq.org/wine-builds/ubuntu/sudo apt-get updatesudo apt-get install --install-recommends winehq-stable#下载caj绿色版一般6.0可以了，运行exe文件即可。#设置快捷方式，命令为 wine ./XX.exe,即可。 为知笔记的安装#必要软件安装12345678sudo apt-get install gitsudo apt-get install build-essentialsudo apt-get install cmakesudo apt-get install zlib1g-devcd /home/skwget http://download.qt.io/official_releases/qt/5.7/5.7.0/qt-opensource-linux-x64-5.7.0.runchmod +x qt-opensource-linux-x64-5.7.0.run./qt-opensource-linux-x64-5.7.0.run #Clone为知笔记源代码123456cd /home/skmkdir WizTeamcd WizTeamgit clone https://github.com/WizTeam/WizQTClient.gitcd WizQTClientgit checkout 2.4.2 #编译源代码1sudo apt-get install libgl1-mesa-dev libglu1-mesa-dev #运行QT，打开./WizTeam/WizQTClient/CMakeLists.txt #运行为知笔记即可

posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
